name: De Ville Weppenaar
bio: I developed a curiosity towards Go through wanting to better understand the tools we used at work. I was pleasantly surprised to see how straightforward the language specification is. Iâ€™m keen to learn and to help others on their Go journey.

name: Jordan Peterson
bio: Go is my first and favorite compiled language. I love its extensive standard library and its documentation conventions, tooling, and idioms that make the code useful and accessible to programmers with a wide range of experience.

name: Denys Nahurnyi
bio: Someone wise said that the best way to learn something is to tech that, so here I am :). I don't write on Go for a long time but I already know enough to share some useful info and help newbies. Happy to help!

name: Haruya Shida
bio: Originally a .NET developer. Now a big Go lover for its simplicity.
